700885f-a.title: Bronx: Gun Hill Road (East) - Decatur Avenue
700885f-a.text:
East Gunhill Road (running fcom extreme right directly in front of
2-story brick house, to extreme left on which elevated structure is seen),
east from Decatur Ave., as viewed from the hill at the N.E. corner of the
latter Ave. The two buildings seen in the center of the view around
which the elevated structure bends southward on Webster Ave. bear3Nos.
3488 and 3490 on the latter. The elevated is the shuttle line between
the Third Ave. line at East 210th Street and the White Plains Road subway
of the I.R.T. system.
June 6, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
